summary:
My mission is inspire people to perform controls properly and ensure that all Financial Statements disclosure are accurate and the major Company risks are mitigated. 

I have more than ten years of experience in internal audit and internal controls focused on COSO and SoX with an international background. I am from Brazil, with the Italian citizenship (passport), which allows me to work in any country of European Union. 

I speak English, Portuguese, Italian and I have a good knowledge of Spanish. 

Managers used to say that I am very committed, analytical and organized. 

Please, let me know if you would like to know more about me. 

#sox #internalcontrols #internalauditor #EUcitizen #COSO #portuguese #netherlands
